Name: Diflunisal

Parameter: area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC)
Sentece: Ten pharmacokinetic profiles obtained from 8 patients showed a maximum plasma diflunisal concentration of 62.0 +/- 26.5 mg/L after 2.76 +/- 1.87 hours, and an area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC) of 678.3 +/- 362.3 mg/L.h.
Title: Pharmacokinetics of diflunisal in patients.
Name: Diflunisal

Sentece: Analysis of biliary secretion of diflunisal in 4 patients suggested a biliary elimination and subsequent enterohepatic circulation ranging between 2.4 and 15.1%.
Title: Pharmacokinetics of diflunisal in patients.
Name: Diflunisal
